meanings.sent1: The bird's upsweep into the sky was graceful and elegant.
meanings.sent2: I watched the upsweep of the kite as it caught the wind.
meanings.sent3: The upsweep of the roller coaster made everyone laugh with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an upsweep that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The painter captured the upsweep of the mountain in his masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: She used the broom to upsweep the fallen leaves from the porch.
meanings.sent2: The flames began to upsweep towards the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the cards upsweep into the air with a flick of his wrist.
meanings.sent4: His spirits started to upsweep as he saw the finish line ahead.
meanings.sent5: The wind caused the sand to upsweep in swirling patterns on the beach.
